attributes.action: Allow minimum age for the upcoming EU referendum to be set at 16.
attributes.additional_details: It is clear 16-17 year olds share the same keen level of interest as other voters, as in the Scottish referendum of 2015 the voting turnout of 16-17 year olds was an astonishing 75% (source: Guardian)
attributes.background: The result of the EU referendum will drastically change the lives of the future generations and it is inexcusable for the majority of teens who share a keen interest in current affairs to be excluded from an event that will undoubtedly change the course of Britain's future.
